meanings.sent1: The two conterminous countries shared a long border.
meanings.sent2: The conterminous states were separated by a river.
meanings.sent3: The conterminous neighbors always argued over the property line.
meanings.sent4: Their conterminous properties seemed to blend into one another.
meanings.sent5: The conterminous mountains stood side by side, creating a stunning view.

meanings.definition: Having the same boundaries or extent in space.
meanings.sent1: The conterminous fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: The conterminous rooms in the house were all painted the same color.
meanings.sent3: The conterminous buildings in the city formed a perfect square.
meanings.sent4: Their conterminous territories overlapped in a harmonious way.
meanings.sent5: The conterminous forests seemed to merge into one vast wilderness.
